reviewText: Wonderful and the price was just right! !!!!!

This dvd gives basic steps. I wish it showed a bit more, slowly with the more fluent dancers. Also, the rap/lyrics is repeated by the main dancer. It was nice to hear twice, but beyond that becomes a bit much. However, the dvd does give one the basic steps to begin. After that, YouTube is helpful.
This is the perfect video if you want to learn how to Step correctly, in the old school traditional smooth style of Chicago Stepping.  You don't have to look any further.

The Video was OK. I would recommend taking the class. Also, I did not like the idea that it was sent requiring a signature. I to take off work to pick it up from the post office. Will not order again from this company.

This is the most easy to learn steppin DVD.  There is a female instructor who tells and demonstrates the steps for the ladies and there is a male who demonstrates the steps men do.  It is really easy to follow.  This is the real Chicago Style steppin.  Excellent demonstration and easy to follow.  We love it.
